name: greatly
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: very much, used especially to show how much you feel or experience something
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤用于表示强烈感受或体验）非常，很，大大地

example.eg: I greatly regret not having told the truth.
example.egtrans: 我非常后悔没有说出实情。

example.eg: Her piano playing has greatly improved/has improved greatly.
example.egtrans: 她的钢琴弹奏大有进步。
